resources.string: Alert your dear ones incase of emergency. Add them to your emergency contacts.
You can add up to 3 contacts
Contact already present. Please try adding another contact.
You can add up to 3 contacts. Remove any contact to add another.
Needs to update your current location to our server in order to verify our closest driver\'s availability and track the location during trip.
Read contacts permission is necessary to pick emergency contact
Call phone and read phone state permission is necessary contact driver
We would like to access your media in order to set the profile picture
Are you sure want to delete the contact?
